message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $8,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my absolute bottom line.
